title: Wonder
desc: Graphic design assignment for Advanced Studio Art at Milton Academy.

title: Inescapable Identity
desc: Identity assignment, for Advanced Drawing at Milton Academy.

title: Colossus
desc: Final project. Advanced Drawing, Milton Academy.

title: Giant Donut
desc: Small painting assignment. Advanced Painting, Milton Academy.

title: Still Life Painting No. 2
desc: Still life painting assignment. Advanced Painting, Milton Academy

title: To the Lighthouse
desc: Final painting project. Advanced Painting, Milton Academy.

title: Vase No. 2
desc: Still life drawing. ARDEL Studio.

title: Vase No. 7
desc: Still life with Chinese ink, drawn with a bamboo stick! ARDEL Studio.

title: Twig Studies
desc: Twig studies in pointillism style. My wrist was dead by the time I finished! ARDEL Studio.

title: Cloth Study
desc: Practice with cloth. ARDEL Studio

title: Waiting for Godot
desc: Experimenting with sky textures and alternate colors. Also just finished reading the play. Advanced Independent Art, Milton Academy.

title: Spectral Force
desc: Another sky piece. Inspired by a strange sunset sky. Advanced Independent Art, Milton Academy.

title: Roadkill
desc: Compound word assignment. Digital Design Foundations, UPenn.

title: The Face-plant-er
desc: For this assignment we're are to illustrate a page in an alphabet book of useless inventions, using a style inspired by the illustrator Sarah Fanelli. Digital Design Foundations, UPenn.

title: Manic Monday
desc: Show graphic design for Pan-Asian Dance Troupe's Spring 2009 show, "Manic Monday".

title: Kim Eng Promo
desc: Promotional designs for mugs and shopping bags. Client: Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) PLC.

title: Strike Rouge Gundam
desc: Strike Rouge Gundam. Referenced from a 1/144 model I borrowed from a friend. The figure is rigged. Texture material is basic blinn, except for the arms, shoulders, and pelvis, where I used mental ray rounded corners. 3D Modeling, UPenn.

title: Celebrity!
desc: Poster for Pan-Asian Dance Troupe's Spring 2010 show, "Celebrity!"

title: Thai Night 2010
desc: Flier design for Thai Student Association's Thai Night 2010.

title: Why can't sailors play cards?
desc: Riddle pop-up book project. Final project for Digital Design Foundations, UPenn

title: IVA 2010
desc: Website for the 10th International Conference on Intelligent Virtual Agents taking place at UPenn September 20-22, 2010.

title: slackertracker
desc: Project for the 2009 PennApps Competition. Won 2nd Place.

title: PennThai
desc: Homepage for Thai Student Association at UPenn.

title: who's in my class?
desc: Project from the 2010 PennApps 48-hour hackathon competition. Won "Most User-Friendly App".

title: 100FF Widget Design
desc: Concept design for 100 Fantasy Football Community's desktop widget. Copyrighted materials belong to Lowe Limited and 100 Community.

title: Thai Airways Calendar
desc: Concept design for Thai Airway's 2010 calendar. Copyrighted materials belong to Lowe Limited and Thai Airways.

title: Axe Landing Page
desc: Concept design for the landing page for AXE's promotional campaign in 2009. Copyrighted materials belong to Lowe Limited and AXE.

title: studyspaces @ penn
desc: A web app designed to let students check for various available study spaces at UPenn. Currently a work in progress!

title: Thai Night 2011
desc: Flier design for Thai Student Association's Thai Night 2011

title: PennThai T-Shirts 2011
desc: T-shirt design for PennThai's new t-shirt for the upcoming Thai Night 2011.

title: Pan-Asian "Wu"
desc: T-shirt design for Pan-Asian Dance Troupe.

title: Penn Course Review
desc: A complete reconstruction of Penn's old course review website that was originally launched in 2002. The goal is to bring Web 2.0 design and technology to Penn's most important class reviews resource.

title: Global Illumination on WebGL
desc: Real-time renderer on WebGL with Global Illumination. Senior Design Project. Uses ray tracing and photon mapping. Effects include, direct lighting, indirect lighting, reflection, and refraction.

title: Ray Marching Distance Fields
desc: A real-time renderer on WebGL, uses the technique of ray marching distance fields. Final project for GPU Architecture class.

title: DroidXtend
desc: An Android app that turns the phone into a 3D controller. Implemented with a Maya plug-in. Controls rotation, panning, and zoom. Won "Best Android App" Award in the 2011 PennApps Mobile 48-hour hackathon.

title: Hudson Beach Glass
desc: Website design mockup for Hudson Beach Glass, Philadelphia.

title: Volumetric Renderer
desc: A real-time volumetric renderer on WebGL. Simulates 3D textures using 2D texture atlas. Features transmittance-based lighting, volumetric self-shadowing, and multiple lights.

title: CodeDJ Live
desc: Interactive real-time music visualizer with live GLSL compilation. Completed for the 2012 PennApps 48-hour hackathon.

title: Guess Who?
desc: Show graphic design for Pan-Asian Dance Troupe 2012 Spring Show "Guess Who? - Murder on the Wedding Aisle"

title: WebTube
desc: Browse the internet through the comfort of an old-school CRT TV. Completed for the 2013 PennApps 48-hour hackathon. Won 3rd place overall and Audience Choice Award.

title: Penguin Planet
desc: Fill up the map quickly before the ice melts! And be careful of those dangerous penguins! Game Design Class, UPenn

title: CUDA Path Tracer
desc: Interactive real-time iterative path tracer in CUDA. Final project for Advanced Rendering Seminar.

title: WebGL GPU Particles
desc: Interactive real-time particle simulator on WebGL using GLSL shaders.

title: A Particle Dream
desc: Interactive particle simulation for your mind. Dive in and fly along the milky way or wave your hand through the star dust. What do you see? Is it a dog? A bear? Or a flower? Relax and let your mind run free. This is your dream. Featured in Chrome Experiments.

title: lmv.rocks
tools: Javascript, WebGL, Polymer, Autodesk Viewing API
desc: Custom showcase gallery built using Polymer, Google Material Library, and Autodesk Viewing API.

title: Audio Landscape
desc: Put on some music, turn on your mic, and fly through this infinite audio landscape! Also works on mobile and other touch devices. Supports leap motion.

title: 3D Web Fest Graphic
desc: Real-time show graphics made for the 2016 3D Web Fest at Fort Mason, San Francisco.

title: Apollo 11
desc: Collaboration between Smithsonian and Autodesk to digitize the "Columbia" Apollo 11 Command Module, to mark the 47th anniversary of the lunar landing mission.

title: PBR Showcase
desc: Demo to showcase PBR capabilities of the Play engine, featuring the glTF Damaged Helmet. (Contact me directly for more information and demos for Play.)

title: Rubik's Snake
desc: Play with the Rubik's Snake toy in 3D right in your browser! Come up with your own designs and submit them to share with the world.
